verses.content: Chun, lal Hezekia chun chu chu a hriet chun a silfênhai a keithlêr a, saiip puon ân bel a, LALPA ina chun a lût tah a.
Chun, insûng tieng hotu Eliakim le, lekhaziektu Sebna hai, thiempu upahai chu saiip puon inbelin Amoz naupa zâwlnei Isai kuomah a tir a.
Anni chun a kuomah, “Hezekia chun hieng ang hin a tih, ‘Vawisûn ni hi lunginzîngna ni le, halna ni le hmingsietna ni a nih; nauhai chu an pieng a hun ta sih a, nei dingin hrât- na a um ta si nawh.

A pu Assuria lalin Pathien hring hming hrilse dinga a tir Rabsake thuhrilhai po po chu, LALPA i Pathien chun hrieng a ta, a thuhril, LALPA i Pathienin a thu hriet chu a la kâwk rawi mawh; chu chu lei chun a la um sunhai chu ṭawngṭaipêk rawh,’ a ti che,” an ta.
Chuongchun, lal Hezekia mihai chu Isai kuomah an feh a.
Isai chun an kuomah, “In lalpa kuomah hieng ang hin hril ro,’ LALPA chun hieng ang hin a tih, I thu hriet, Assuria lal mihaiin an mi hrilsietna kha ṭi naw rawh.
Ngai ta, a sûnga chun thlarau inumtir ka ta, thuthang hrieng a ta, ama ramah fe nâwk a tih; chuong- chun, ama ram ngeia chun kâwl- hnâma sukthlûkin inumtir ka tih, a tih,’ tiin,” a ta.
Chuongchun, Rabsake chu a kîr nâwk a, Assuria lal chun Libna khuo a lo thaw lai chu a va hmuh a; Lakis khuoa inthawk chun a suok tah ti a hriet hrim a na.
Chun, “Ngai ta, nangma chu thaw dingin a suok tah,” tia Tirhaka, Ethiopia ram lal chungchâng thu Assuria lal Sennakerib mi hril a lo hriet chun, Hezekia kuomah mihai a tir a,
“Hieng ang hin Juda lal Hezekia kuoma chun hril ro, ‘I Pathien i ring chun Jerusalem khuo Assuria lal kuta pêk ni naw nih tiin hlêm naw raw se che.
Ngai ta, Assuria lalhaiin ram po po sukse vawnga, a chunga an thil- thawhai kha i hriet a; nang hi sanhim i ni bîk ding am a nih?
Hnam tin pathienhai chun ka pi le puhaiin an sukbohmanghai kha an sanhim hlak am a nih? Gozan dâm, Haran dâm, Rezeph dâm, Eden nau hai Telassar khuoa umhai,
Hammath lal hai, Arpad lal hai, Sepharvaim khawpui lal hai, Hena lal dâm, Ivva lal dâm kha khâwlai am an um ta leh?’ tiin,” a ta.
Chun, Hezekia chun a mitirhai kuta inthawk chun lekha a hmuh a, a hang tiem a: chuongchun, Hezekia chu LALPA ina chun a hang lût a, LALPA hmaa chun a phar a.
Chun, Hezekia chu LALPA hmaah a ṭawngṭai a, “Aw LALPA, cherubhai chunga ṭhung, Israel Pa- thien, nang, nang chau hi hnuoi chung ram po po Pathien chu i nih; hnuoi le vân hi nangma siem a nih.
Aw LALPA, i na lo sit la, ngai ta, Aw LALPA i mit meng la, en ta; Pathien hring chu hrilse dinga Sen- nakeribin thu a hung hril hi ngai ta;
LALPA, Assuria lalhaiin hnam- hai le an ramhai chu an suksiet hlak luoh a;
an pathienhai chu meiah an pei bawk hlak a; chuonghai chu pathien an ni naw hrim a, mihriem kuta siem, thing le lung an ni lem a nih; chu lei chun an sukbohmang a nih.
Chuleiin, aw LALPA kan Pa- thien, nang, nangma chau hi LALPA Pathien i nih ti hnuoi chung ram po po hin an hriet theina dingin amaa inthawk hin mi sanhim ngei ngei rawh,” tiin.

Chuong lai chun Amoz naupa Isai chun Hezekia kuomah, “LALPA Israel Pathien chun hieng ang hin a ti a nih ‘Assuria lal Sennakerib sietna ding tienga ka kuoma i ṭawngṭai kha ka lo hriet,’ tiin, mi a tir a.
Hi hi a chungchâng thu LALPA- IN a hril chu a nih, ‘Zion naunu nunghâk chun a hmusit cheh a, a nuisan che a nih; Jerusalem naunu chun a lu a thin khum bawk cheh a.
Tu am i sukhmingsiet a, i hril- siet? Tu chung âm i râwl i sukpuom a, i mit i meng insâng? Israel Mi Inthieng chunga hin annâwm.

I mitirhai hmangin LALPA chu i sukhmingsiet a. Ka tawlailîr tamtak leh Lebanon ramril tlâng insânghai ka hung tlung tah a; chutaka Sidar thing insângtakhai le fâr thing ṭha ṭhahai chu phûr ka ta; a hnuoi ṭhatna hmun rampui umna hmuna chun lût ka tih.
Ram dang tui ka cho suok a, ka tlân hlak a, ka kepha hnuoi hin Aigupta vadunghai po po chu suk- kang vawng ka tih, i tih a.

Keimain inhmaa inthawka chuong chu ka thaw a nizie dâm, inhma laia chuong chu ka siem a nizie dâm chu i hriet naw am a nih? Khaw kul neihai chu in chim khâwm el anga suksetu dingin ka ruot ta che a ni hi.
Chuleiin, a sûnga umhai chun hrâtna an nei nawh a, an zâm a, an hung muolpho ta kha; phûl hlobet ang le hna hring ang le, in chunga hlobet ang le, bu lien hmaa thli em vuoi ang an ni kha.
Kei chun i ṭhung dâm, i lût le i suok dâm, ka chunga i lunginsen hi ka hriet i sawnnaw.
Ka chunga i lunginsen lei le, i ṭawng uong chu ka naa a hung lût tâk leiin ka hnâr inbûk chu i hnârah inbûk ka ta, ka thîrse chu i hmûrah, i hungna lampuia ngei khan inkîrtir nâwk ka ti che,’ tiin.
Chun, hi hi i ta dinga inchikna nîng a ta, tu kum hin bu inhli ring in ta, kum nâwk khawm bu inhli bawk; chun, a kum thumnaa chun buhai tu unla, sîk unla, grêp huonhai siem unla, a rahai fa ro.
Chuongchun, Juda sûnghai laia a la dam sunhai chun a suktiengin zung kei an ta, a tung zâwngin ra nâwk an tih.
Jerusalema inthawkin a la um sunhai, Zion tlânga inthawkin a la damhai chu an suok ding a nih: LALPA ṭhahnemngaina chun chuong chu thâwng a tih.

Chuleiin, LALPA chun Assuria lal chungchâng thu chu hieng ang hin a hril: ‘Hi khawpui hi hung tlung naw nih a, hitaka hin thal kâp bawk naw nih; phaw leh a kâwla hin hung bawk naw nih a, a khaw hrûla hin hnuoi dêng pâwng bawk naw ni hai.
An hungna lampuiah, chutaka ngei chun lêt nâwk a ta, hi khawpui hi hung tlung naw nih,’ LALPAIN a tih.
Keima lei le ka siehlaw David leiin hi khawpui hi sanhim dingin ka vêng ding a nih,” tiin.

Chuongchun, chu zân chun hieng ang hi a hung na, LALPA vân- tirko chu ân thawk suok a, Assuria mihai riekhmuna chun mi nuoi khât le sîng riet le sâng nga a sukhlum a; chun, zîngkâra an hang tho chun, ngai ta, mithi ruong khât el a lo ni tah el a.
Chuongchun, Assuria lal Sen- nakerib chu a suok a, a kîr nâwk a, a fe nâwk ta pei a, Ninevi khuoa chun a um tah a.

Chun, a pathien Nisrok ina chun ama a biek laiin hieng ang hi a hung na, Adrammelek le Sarezer hai chun ama chu kâwlhnâmin an sukhlum tah a; chuongchun, Ararat rama chun an tlân lût tah a. Chun, a naupa Esar-haddon chu ama aiawin ân lal tah a.
